resources.string:
Hey, welcome to the
Bethel mission reciept app!

Select your name from this list so we know who you are when you upload a reciept
Hey, ****! \nSome quick questions\nAbout your trip to make the app work better for you
Server error occurred. Please try again later.
Receipt too long? You can add sections to this receipt after pressing "Take Picture"
There are not any \"Saved for Later\" receipts yet.\n\nReceipts get stored here when an attempt to upload a receipt is made, but the Internet connection is too poor.
To access this receipt later press on the "View Receipts" button and then press on the "Saved for Later" toggle.
